languages.text: {n}Посмурнев, женщина тихо добавляет:{/n} "К сожалению, не могу предложить вам весь наш ассортимент напитков. Количество поставщиков самого интересного товара сократилось из-за исповедальных патрулей. Чую, хлебнем мы еще горя при этой Инцендии Чорда".

{n}Her face darkens as she adds quietly,{/n} "Sadly, I can't offer you our entire selection of drinks. We don't get as many suppliers of the best stuff these days, all because of them confessional units. I'm telling you now, there'll be no end to our troubles with that Incendia Chorda at the reins."
languages.original_text: {n}Посмурнев, женщина тихо добавляет:{/n} "К сожалению, не могу предложить вам весь наш ассортимент напитков. Количество поставщиков самого интересного товара сократилось из-за исповедальных патрулей. Чую, хлебнем мы еще горя при этой Инцендии Чорда".

We don't get as many suppliers of the best stuff these days, all because of them confessional units. I'm telling you now, there'll be no end to our troubles with that Incendia Chorda at the reins."

We don't get as many suppliers of the best stuff these days, all because of them confessional units. I'm telling you now, there'll be no end to our troubles with that Incendia Chorda at the reins."

{n}Her face darkens as she adds quietly,{/n} "Sadly, I can't offer you our entire selection of drinks. We don't get as many suppliers of the best stuff these days, all because of them confessional units. I'm telling you now, there'll be no end to our troubles with that Incendia Chorda at the reins."

{n}Her face darkens as she adds quietly,{/n} "Sadly, I can't offer you our entire selection of drinks. We don't get as many suppliers of the best stuff these days, all because of them confessional units. I'm telling you now, there'll be no end to our troubles with that Incendia Chorda at the reins."

{n}Her face darkens as she adds quietly,{/n} "Sadly, I can't offer you our entire selection of drinks. We don't get as many suppliers of the best stuff these days, all because of them confessional units. I'm telling you now, there'll be no end to our troubles with that Incendia Chorda at the reins."

languages.text: {n}她的脸色变得阴郁，悄悄地补充道。{/n}“遗憾的是，有些饮料恐怕没办法提供给你了。负责供应最好的货的供应商，有一部分已经联系不上了，都是那群忏悔者搞的。我可以告诉你，如今掌权的人是那个因森蒂娅·库尔达，我们的麻烦恐怕要没完没了了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Her face darkens as she adds quietly,{/n} "Sadly, I can't offer you our entire selection of drinks. We don't get as many suppliers of the best stuff these days, all because of them confessional units. I'm telling you now, there'll be no end to our troubles with that Incendia Chorda at the reins."

traits.locale_text: {n}她的脸色变得阴郁，悄悄地补充道。{/n}“遗憾的是，有些饮料恐怕没办法提供给你了。负责供应最好的货的供应商，有一部分已经联系不上了，都是那群忏悔者搞的。我可以告诉你，如今掌权的人是那个因森蒂娅·库尔达，我们的麻烦恐怕要没完没了了。”

languages.text: {n}Su rostro se oscurece mientras afirma:{/n} «Por desgracia, no puedo ofrecerte nuestra selección de bebidas al completo. Últimamente, ya no recibimos tantos suministros de calidad por culpa de las unidades confesionales. De verdad te lo digo: mientras Incendia Chorda esté al mando, no se acabarán nuestros problemas».
languages.original_text: {n}Her face darkens as she adds quietly,{/n} "Sadly, I can't offer you our entire selection of drinks. We don't get as many suppliers of the best stuff these days, all because of them confessional units. I'm telling you now, there'll be no end to our troubles with that Incendia Chorda at the reins."

traits.locale_text: {n}Su rostro se oscurece mientras afirma:{/n} «Por desgracia, no puedo ofrecerte nuestra selección de bebidas al completo. Últimamente, ya no recibimos tantos suministros de calidad por culpa de las unidades confesionales. De verdad te lo digo: mientras Incendia Chorda esté al mando, no se acabarán nuestros problemas».

languages.text: {n}彼女の表情が段々と暗くなり、静かにこう付け加える。{/n}「残念だけど全部の飲み物は出せない。最近は質のいいものを提供してくれる供給者が少なくてね。あのインセンディア・コーダが手綱を握っている限りはまともに営業できないと思う」
languages.original_text: {n}Her face darkens as she adds quietly,{/n} "Sadly, I can't offer you our entire selection of drinks. We don't get as many suppliers of the best stuff these days, all because of them confessional units. I'm telling you now, there'll be no end to our troubles with that Incendia Chorda at the reins."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女の表情が段々と暗くなり、静かにこう付け加える。{/n}「残念だけど全部の飲み物は出せない。最近は質のいいものを提供してくれる供給者が少なくてね。あのインセンディア・コーダが手綱を握っている限りはまともに営業できないと思う」

languages.text: {n}Ihre Miene verdüstert sich, als sie leise hinzufügt:{/n} "Leider kann ich Euch nicht unsere gesamte Getränkeauswahl anbieten. Wir haben nicht mehr so viele Lieferanten für das wirklich gute Zeug, und das nur wegen dieser Beichteinheiten. Ich sage Euch, unsere Sorgen werden kein Ende nehmen, solange diese Incendia Chorda die Zügel in der Hand hält."
languages.original_text: {n}Her face darkens as she adds quietly,{/n} "Sadly, I can't offer you our entire selection of drinks. We don't get as many suppliers of the best stuff these days, all because of them confessional units. I'm telling you now, there'll be no end to our troubles with that Incendia Chorda at the reins."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ihre Miene verdüstert sich, als sie leise hinzufügt:{/n} "Leider kann ich Euch nicht unsere gesamte Getränkeauswahl anbieten. Wir haben nicht mehr so viele Lieferanten für das wirklich gute Zeug, und das nur wegen dieser Beichteinheiten. Ich sage Euch, unsere Sorgen werden kein Ende nehmen, solange diese Incendia Chorda die Zügel in der Hand hält."

languages.text: {n}Son visage s'assombrit alors qu'elle ajoute doucement :{/n} « Malheureusement, je ne peux pas vous proposer l'intégralité de notre carte. On a beaucoup moins de fournisseurs de qualité ces derniers temps, à cause des unités de confession. Vous pouvez me croire, on n'est pas sortis de l'auberge avec Incendia Chorda au pouvoir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Her face darkens as she adds quietly,{/n} "Sadly, I can't offer you our entire selection of drinks. We don't get as many suppliers of the best stuff these days, all because of them confessional units. I'm telling you now, there'll be no end to our troubles with that Incendia Chorda at the reins."

traits.locale_text: {n}Son visage s'assombrit alors qu'elle ajoute doucement :{/n} « Malheureusement, je ne peux pas vous proposer l'intégralité de notre carte. On a beaucoup moins de fournisseurs de qualité ces derniers temps, à cause des unités de confession. Vous pouvez me croire, on n'est pas sortis de l'auberge avec Incendia Chorda au pouvoir. »

languages.text: {n}Lafına sesini alçaltarak devam ederken yüzü düşüyor.{/n} "Ne yazık ki size tüm içki seçeneklerimizi sunmam mümkün değil. Şu günah çıkarma birimleri yüzünden bugünlerde en iyi içkileri getiren tedarikçi pek kalmadı. Dizginler İncendia Chorda'nın elindeyken bizde dertler bitmez, benden söylemesi."
languages.original_text: {n}Her face darkens as she adds quietly,{/n} "Sadly, I can't offer you our entire selection of drinks. We don't get as many suppliers of the best stuff these days, all because of them confessional units. I'm telling you now, there'll be no end to our troubles with that Incendia Chorda at the reins."

traits.locale_text: {n}Lafına devam ederken yüzü düşüyor.{/n} "Ne yazık ki size tüm içki seçeneklerimizi sunmam mümkün değil. Şu günah çıkarma birimleri yüzünden, bugünlerde en iyi içkiler için pek fazla tedarikçi kalmadı. Dizginler Incendia Chorda'nın elindeyken bizde dertler bitmez, benden söylemesi."
